children.subject: If we applied, is there a timeline on when we can expect to hear back?

history.content:
If you are interested in getting involved with CS 70 next semester, you can apply to be a reader via our supplemental application by next Thursday 12/02. Our readers play an integral role in the operations of our course by staffing OH and grading homework assignments and we also hire the overwhelming majority of uGSIs from our reader pool.

If you filled out our supplemental application for the uGSI position, feel free to just copypaste your responses over from that form since the questions are mostly the same, though you are more than welcome to change things up.

In addition to filling out this form, remember to also fill out the official department application. The specific level of interest for our reader position isn't too relevant as long as you indicate some level of interest and we also do not consider the priority deadline.

If you have any questions, don't hesitate to ask below!
